scripts.i-all: lerna link && lerna exec npm install
scripts.publish: npm run proxy && npm run prepublishOnly  && lerna publish --conventional-commits && npm run afterpublishOnly
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run before-build && lerna run build
scripts.before-build: cd ./packages/core/acme-client && time /t >build.md && git add ./build.md && git commit -m "build: prepare to build"
